topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5408da396368724d90900100#post_5408da396368724d90900100

Just ignore the Hype. Let's be honest, it tends to blow the game out of proportion and even if it's good, everyone elses expectations get so high that by the time they play it, they think it's not what they were promised.

Focus entirely on Bayo 1 and don't acknowledge 2 until later.

At least, it tends to work on my side.
